name: The benefits of rationality
description:
Story:

The story has two protagonists, a commander of the exploration squad who turns her back on his companions and an elite soldier who will face a system-ending threat.

Game info:

The story will likely be divided into 5 or 6 chapters. You'll be allowed to travel around the map and other planets as soon as you finish the first chapter.

Commands:

  • Key arrows to move;
  • SHIFT to run;
  • ENTER to select and analyze things;

Scripts:

  • Victor Engine - Victor Sant
  • Hime - Himeworks (http://himeworks.com)
  • Dreadwing93
  • SumRndmDde - http://sumrndm.site/
  • Yanfly Engine Plugins
  • Heartbreak61
  • Mr. Trivel
  • Daimonious Tails - Vlue
  • Fallen Angel Olivia

  • Zalerinian

Warning:

The game info will be updated once the full version of the game gets released.
